content.question: A hard-boiled egg is removed from a pot of hot water and set on the table to cool. The rate of change of the egg’s temperature <math alttext="uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>T</mi></mrow></math> with respect to time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></math> is proportional to the difference between the egg’s temperature in degrees Fahrenheit (<math alttext="degrees F" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>°</mi><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></math>) and the room temperature of <math alttext="75 degrees Fahrenheit" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>75</mn><mi>°</mi><mtext>F</mtext></mrow></math>. Which of the following is a differential equation that describes this relationship, where <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></math> is a constant?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of uppercase T, with respect to t, equals, k times uppercase T" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of uppercase T, with respect to t, equals, k times uppercase T, minus 75" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>T</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>75</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of uppercase T, with respect to t, equals, k times, open parenthesis, t minus 75, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>75</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of uppercase T, with respect to t, equals, k times, open parenthesis, uppercase T minus 75, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>T</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>75</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of uppercase T, with respect to t, equals, k times, open parenthesis, uppercase T minus 75, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>T</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>T</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>75</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
